physicsCalc

Class Calculation

  • java.lang.Object
    • physicsCalc.PhysicsCalculator
      • physicsCalc.Calculation

  • public class Calculation
extends physicsCalc.PhysicsCalculator
    This class handles the submenu, calculations and mechanics of the program The bulk of the program is contained in this file
    Author:
    Andrew

        private double getDouble(java.lang.String variableName,
                         double value)
        Parameters:
        variableName - Takes the variable name so it prints out the correct prompt for the user
        value - Takes the double and assigns it with a value
        Returns:
        returns the value back to the previous function so the appropriate function can run the calculation

      • search

        public void search()
        This handles the submenu for searching Note that this does not actually link to any formulas It only returns matches. Additionally it only recognizes upper case characters due to oddities
